title: Random freezes in game happened twice now but i can still hear my friends in teamspeak
body: so basically had this weird thing happening recently, 2 times now my game or screen freezes randomly i cant alt tab or anything no blue screen it just freezes i can still hear my buddies in ts as i communicated it to them, i had to hard restart my pc which is new i built it myself, at first i thought i could need cleaning out so i got a can of compressed air and did all that about a week ago, now it has happened again randomly in a game, so i checked my reliability history and there is nothing there other than windows did not shut down correctly. im not sure whether this is an issue with drivers or league i doubt its my pc i have 16gb dd4 ram 970 graphics card 650w psu i5 6600k a 500gb samsung ssd 1 tb harddrive 4 fans so i doubt it is a overheating issue plus i just cleaned it all out it was not even that dusty. anyone else experiancing this in league my friend said hes had the same thing recently and it might not be an issue with my comp but im not sure im stumped

replies.body: Are you on Windows 10?  An update auto-enabled the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which has been causing freezing problems like this.  Disabling it should fix things up!
